page.title: 03Home Life in Calverton 1985
page.content: A farmer and his wife live at Manor Farm Cottage Calverton. They have three children.The farmer goes to work at 8.OOam.The eldest son goes to school on the school bus that comes to collect him at 8.40am outside his house, to go to Stony Stratford. The wife gives the children their breakfast at about 8.30am.Sometimes she goes into Stony Stratford walking along narrow country paths.She has to be back at 1.00pm because the farmer comes in for lunch.The eldest comes son comes in at 3.00pm .He goes out to play with his friends from a cottage down the the lane.They go into the meadow and fish in the brook.Sometimes his mum will bring the other two children to play in the meadow to get some fresh air. The children have their tea at 5.30pm and get ready for bed.
